downloadTitle: My Tasks Aggregation in SharePoint Server and Exchange Task Integration
downloadDescription: This white paper discusses enabling and using My Tasks for synchronization, both in SharePoint Online and SharePoint 2013 on-premises environments, and it also covers new integration functionality with Exchange Server 2013.

downloadFile.name: My Tasks Aggregation and Exchange Integration.docx

detailsSection: This white paper discusses enabling and using My Tasks for synchronization, both in SharePoint Online and SharePoint 2013 on-premises environments, and it also covers new integration functionality with Exchange Server 2013.
detailsSection_file_name: My Tasks Aggregation and Exchange Integration.docx
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button in the upper right corner of this page to start the download.
  2. Click Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Find the file on your hard disk and double-click it to open it.
